
Begin by loading necessary packages.
```{r}
library(haven)
library(jsonlite)
```


Accessing the CSV file
```{r}
subscriptions_df <- read.csv("subscriptions.csv") 

str(subscriptions_df)
```

```{r}
subscriptions_df
```

Access the JSON file
```{r}
json_df <- fromJSON("reviews.json")
```

```{r}
str(json_df)
```


The data in read in as a list and we want to convert it to a data frame.

```{r}
reviews_df <- json_df$reviews
head(reviews_df)
```

Access the SAS data set
```{r}
techsupportevals_df <- read_sas("techsupportevals.sas7bdat")
head(techsupportevals_df)
```
